text: Bruce Allen Harrell (born October 10, 1958) is an American politician and attorney. He is the Mayor of Seattle since 2022. He was the mayor before for a short time in 2017. He was a member of the Seattle City Council. He was first elected to the city council in 2007 and was re-elected in 2011 and 2015, and did not run again in 2019.King County Election Results http://your.kingcounty.gov/elections/200711/resPage17.htm ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Seattle Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Virginia
title: Bruce Harrell
